title: Akkam Pakkam Lyrics Kreedam
stanzas:
Akkam Pakkam yaarumilla
boologam vendum
andhi pagal unnarugae
naan vazha vendum

en aasayellaam
un nerukkathile
en aayul varai
un anaippinilae

verenna venum
ulagathile
indha inbam podhum
nenjinilae
aezhe aezhu jenmam
vazhndhu vitten

Akkam Pakkam yaarumilla
boologam vendum
andhi pagal unnarugae
naan vazha vendum

nee pesum vaarthaigal
segarithu sevaen anbae
oru agaraathi.

nee thoongum nerathil
thoongaamal
paarpaen dhinam
un thalai kodhi

kayyoduthaan
kai korthu thaan
un marbu soottil
mugam pudhaippen

verenna venum
ulagathile
indha inbam podhum
nenjinilae
aezhe aezhu jenmam
vazhndhu vitten

verenna venum
ulagathile
indha inbam podhum
nenjinilae
aezhe aezhu jenmam
vazhndhu vitten

seo.title: Akkam Pakkam Lyrics Kreedam
seo.description: Get the complete Akkam Pakkam Lyrics Kreedam from Kreedam. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by GV PrakashKumar and sung by Sadhana Sargam. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Kreedam, GV PrakashKumar, Sadhana Sargam, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
